ComicInfo.Title: Invasion New York
ComicInfo.Summary: Invasion New York: Omen heads up a full blown invasion of New York seeking a powerful alien presence. Prophet and Youngblood succeed in stopping him but end up killing the alien as well. The essence of the deceased Dr. Wells is integrated into the D.O.C.C. satellite.
